title: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: NYS FOIL Request- Oath of office and Bond Information

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

• Photocopies of public officials Oaths of Office for:
1. Stanley Joseph #15154 
2. Alan S. Acevedo #20541 
3. Denis T. Gamez #2198
4. Joseph A. Sousa #3235
*ALL POLICE OFFICERS FROM  THE 113TH PRECINCT*

• Photocopies of Public Officials surety bonds for public officials listed above that is required by the state of New York under Universal Citation: NY Pub Off L § 11.
• Photocopies of Public Officials Blanket Surety Bond for public officials listed above if applicable.
• Photocopies of their Surety Liability Insurance policy if applicable.
• Photocopies of their Errors & Omissions (E&O), a Surety Liability Insurance policy, and the Duty of Care policy if applicable.
• Photocopies of their Risk Management Policy if applicable.

• Photocopies of the following documents if applicable:
o ACORD 125
o ACORD 126
o ACORD 127
o ACORD 128
o The documents should indicate the policy number and the insured amount of the policy.

• Photocopies of their Certificate of liability if applicable.
• Public Officials and/or any other bonds pertaining to proof of liability and policies. **Based on any and all loses of financial responsibility due to negligence or dishonesty. Any and all based on the contract of terms and conditions.
• Photocopies of their Faithful Performance Bond if applicable.
• Photocopies of their Fidelity Bond if applicable.
• Photocopies of their Public Employee Dishonesty Policy if applicable.
• Photocopies of their Public Employee Blanket Bond if applicable.
• Photocopies of their Statutory Bond if applicable.
• Photocopies of their Official Bond if applicable.
• Photocopies of the Power of Attorney for the Surety Bond company for public officials listed above, if applicable.
• Photocopies of the Blanket Bond Power of Attorney for the Surety Bond company for public officials listed above ,if applicable.


I am a private citizen seeking information concerning your public official surety bond that you are required by the state of New York to obtain before swearing the oath of office.

New York Universal Citation: NY Pub Off L § 11 (4): Notwithstanding the provisions of this section or any other law, general or special, requiring an official undertaking or bond to be conditioned substantially to the effect that a state officer, clerk or employee will faithfully discharge his duties and promptly account for and pay over all moneys or property received by him in his official capacity, the comptroller may, in his discretion, waive the requirement of procuring such official undertaking or bond, and the expense of procuring an official undertaking or bond shall not be a charge upon the state unless the comptroller shall first have approved the necessity of requiring such official undertaking or bond.

Public Official Surety Bond requests fall under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. § 552, The Sunshine Act 5 U.S.C. § 552b, New York Freedom of Information Law (FOIL), and by law you are obligated to supply me with this information.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Leneice Ingram

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Government Employee Salary Data (Comptroller)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

A copy of the most recent database maintained by this agency detailing government employee compensation across the state.

I am specifically requesting that this release include, for each State employee, the following: Name of Employee, Age, Gender, Ethnicity, Job Title, Agency/department, City/location in which employee is stationed, and Earnings.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sam

communications.subject: RE: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Government Employee Salary Data (Comptroller)
communications.communication:
Please see attached in response to your request.

Thank you,

Jessica K. Velez
Deputy General Counsel
Office of the Comptroller
555 W. Monroe St., Ste. 1400S-A
Chicago, IL 60661
Office: 312-814-1400
